sources.title: Borderline (restored, colorized) (1950, noir, imdb score: 6.1)
sources.description: Borderline is a 1950 American crime film noir directed by William A. Seiter and starring Fred MacMurray and Claire Trevor . It was filmed from late May to early July 1949 at Republic Studios .

metadata.Plot: A bodyguard protects a pop superstar and her athlete boyfriend from a determined stalker in 1990s Los Angeles.
metadata.Actors: Samara Weaving, Ray Nicholson, Eric Dane
